name: VICOD-91
description:
VICOD-91 is an educational game that teaches about a "fictional" respiratory virus that's surging into the world.

Through an interactive story, the player must answer several questions about cellular biology and virology to break into the cell and replicate more copies of VICOD-91.

It includes a small shooting game where you must bind your "S" proteins with the ACE-2 receptors of the target cell.

The game should last 10 minutes, and it includes some basic 3D animations.
